sense.gloss: gadid (any fish of the family Gadidae, incl. cod, haddock, whiting and pollack)
nonsense, irresponsible remark, codswallop, hogwash, rubbish
cod roe (roe of any fish from family Gadidae, esp. salted walleye pollack roe)
(eating or drinking) to one's heart's content
indiscriminately, blindly, at random, recklessly, thoughtlessly, excessively, profusely
dried codfish soaked in water for few days, and cooked almost to dryness in soy sauce and water (Kyoto speciality)
sablefish (Anoplopoma fimbria), black cod, Japanese bluefish, North Pacific bluefish, candlefish, sable, blue cod, coal cod, coalfish, beshow, skil, skilfish

sdata.j: ↑鶏↑↓にわとり↓の↑頭数↑↓とうすう↓を、↑卵↑↓たまご↓から↑孵化↑↓ふか↓する↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑数↑↓かぞ↓えておくのは↑非常↑↓ひじょう↓に↑賢明↑↓けんめい↓なやり↑方↑↓かた↓だ。↑何故↑↓なぜ↓なら、↑鶏↑↓にわとり↓というのは↑無闇矢鱈↑↓むやみやたら↓に↑動↑↓うご↓き↑回↑↓まわ↓るものだから、↑正確↑↓せいかく↓に↑数↑↓かぞ↓えることなど↑出来↑↓でき↓ない。
sdata.e: People who count their chickens before they are hatched act very wisely because chickens run about so absurdly that it's impossible to count them accurately.

sdata.j: ↑鱈場蟹↑↓たらばがに↓は↑大型↑↓おおがた↓↑甲殻↑↓こうかく↓↑類↑↓るい↓である。
sdata.e: The red king crab is a large crustacean.
